svg.text: The cavern opens before you, stalactites dripping with phosphorescent moss…
The evening air is thick with pine as your party arrives at the Mistwood Forest.
Ancient trees tower above, their gnarled branches twisting like skeletal fingers
against the darkening sky. A narrow path leads deeper into the woods…
I light a torch and take the lead,
Thorin lights a torch: bright light 20ft radius, dim light +20ft.
AC remains unchanged with shield equipped.
"Who dares enter the Mistwood at this hour? Turn back,
or face what sleeps beneath the roots…"
Jot down notes during the session…
